title: Four takeaways about Sen. Mike Lee's efforts to overturn the 2020 election, from Robert Gehrke - Salt Lake Tribune
content:
1. Four takeaways about Sen. Mike Lee's efforts to overturn the 2020 election, from Robert Gehrke  Salt Lake Tribune
  2. CNN Exclusive: 'We need ammo. We need fraud examples. We need it this weekend.' What the Meadows texts reveal about how two Trump congressional allies lobbied the White House to overturn the election.  CNN
  3. A timeline of events culminating in Sen. Mike Lee's texts to Mark Meadows trying to overturn the 2020 election.  Salt Lake Tribune
  4. Trump's fraud evidence was never coming. Trump's fraud evidence is never coming.  The Washington Post
  5. Texts reveal two GOP lawmakers turned on Trump's attempt to overturn election  CNN
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: The new text messages, obtained by CNN, show us a fuller extent of Utah Sen. Mike Lee's efforts to overturn the 2020 election and keep Donald Trump in the White House. Here are four takeaways from those text messages, Robert Gehrke explains.
